website_summaries.verdict: One of the best all-around marine subwoofers you can purchase without getting into premium territory.
pros: Comes as a complete, durable subwoofer package
Molded enclosure is easy to install with minimal modifications made to the boat itself
Great sound production for a sub of this size
Stands up to harsh weather conditions
cons: Volume and dynamics can feel overpowering at first

customer_reviews.title: CLEAN  CRISP SOUND AND WATERPROOF!!! CLARION NAILED IT !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I WASNT EXPECTING THIS SUB TO SOUND SO GOOD!!! AMAZING QUALITY FOR THE PRICE YOU CANT BEAT IT. CLARION ALSO SELLS AN RGB SET UP FOR THIS EXACT SUB!! COULDN'T ASK FOR A BETTER SUB FOR THE PRICE... TOO BAD THEY DISCONTINUED THIS SPEAKER BECAUSE ITS GREAT ALL THE WAY AROUND. FIVE STARS ALL DAY LONG.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... but you really need 2 of these to get great sound. If you have it in your budget ...
customer_reviews.text: If it was a pair I'd give it 5 stars but you really need 2 of these to get great sound. If you have it in your budget buy a pair and you will be very happy with the sound! I have mine hooked up to a 500 watt 4 channel Boss amp and it sound great. Initially I had one sub and that just was not enough but 2 does the job very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Dickman

customer_reviews.title: Good Price and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my older model speaker that went bad with this new one. Easy to install and it worked as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Craparotta

customer_reviews.title: Great sub. Direct replacement sub
customer_reviews.text: Sub was direct replacement for my boat. Simple remove and replace. Grood sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for the price if you build it into a box or sealed area.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Speaker worked fine but the grill does not snap over it
customer_reviews.text: Speaker worked fine but the grill does not snap over it, I need to figure our shims of some sort, it is surface mounted and the grill should just smap on but it does not,
customer_reviews.author: joe d

customer_reviews.title: Should have paid a little more for a better speaker. Oh well
customer_reviews.text: These speakers do not have the sound quality I was expecting from Clarion. Should have paid a little more for a better speaker. Oh well, I guess hind sight is 20/20!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Colbert

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit - matched to my amp
customer_reviews.text: replaced the old 15 year old sub on my boat. perfect fit - matched to my amp. sounds good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a 10 year old Clarion sub with this newer model. Fit right in, holes lined up, so no extra drilling required. Sounds great, plenty of bass.
customer_reviews.author: L. Yeaton

customer_reviews.title: great for marine use
customer_reviews.text: As advertised....nice little sub for the marine environment..my boat had this subwoofer previously and it lasted about 9 years before it deteriorated away so I decided to stay with the origina..l not a bad little speaker
customer_reviews.author: Dwyane

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was hoping for but I guess for the money it's not bad. I have it on my boat, when I turn it up, the sub itself hits the grill and rattles. You would think for using the grill that it came with it shouldn't do that. It's not being over powered (turned up too loud) That is normal use. I had to turn down the sub bass to get a somewhat okay sound while taking most of the bass away. But for average use it may not be so bad. I will spend the money and get something a little more up my ally.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: fun. Already ordered jls
customer_reviews.text: Had to exchange one a week into it, other went out a month later after exchange period was over. Sound is clear and loud at first. But after a couple long days on the water, voice coil ultimately failed on both, and I had them pushed by a 50wx2 Jl amp. Currently trying to get refunds or replacement from clarion, fun. Already ordered jls, which I should've ordered from the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for price
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks of the speaker - I expected it to sound less than higher quality woofer but it’s not bad for the purpose. I’m using mines in a Polaris slingshot so it’s not going to sound the same as in a enclosed vehicle. I can feel the bump though and it’s working nice. I’m running it in that clarion 5ch amp.
customer_reviews.author: adraper

customer_reviews.title: Hard hitting clear sound
customer_reviews.text: I just installed this yesterday. Contrary to most other speakers I purchased, this actually came with paperwork! It came with 4 screws that were about 1 3/4 long (didn't measure) but has holes in the speaker for 8. IT HITS HARD AND CLEAR. For the price I am very impressed. Time will tell how it holds up, but at this point I have zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Mystery Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, sounds great. Stands up to harsh Key West marine conditions.
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing, sounds even better. Can't turn it up too much or it vibrates but definitely has great quality and looks. Have it on our Key West Yacht and Breakfast. Stood up to the marine test of time, over a year now and still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: These are a great value as factory replacement speaker
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value as factory replacement speaker. If you need to replace you 6 or 6.5 inch DVC subs these will work great. If you are looking to upgrade your still good working OE 6-6.5 inch DVC subs then look elsewhere these are nearly identical to my OE Monsoon DVC subs in my 98 Firebird and I'm fine with that. They fit with no modifications to either the car or subs and sound good, I put some weather stripping on the back of the mounting surface so they wouldn't rattle and used the wires off the EO subs so it was plug and play so to speak.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Wick

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: We own the predecessor to this (Clarion CMSW10.1) that came on our 26ft pontoon boat, and are online shopping for a replacement. It's not bad bass (not clean either though), but the speaker bottoms (hits on extension) the plastic grill and makes a rattling noise -so we have to leave the grill off.
customer_reviews.author: JBS

product_meta.title: Clarion CMG2512W 10-Inch 350-Watt Marine Subwoofer (Each)
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Frustration-Free PackagingClarion invented the Marine Audio category and no one does it better. That’s why you can count on them as your first source for a complete marine sound system, including speakers, amps and subwoofers . Turn your pleasure boat into party central. With Clarion, the possibilities are sounding better all the time.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars37 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
